means: （尤指因为回忆起过去而开心或感伤得）泪眼蒙眬的

sentence.Network_en: They got misty-eyed listening to records of Ruby Murray singing "Danny Boy".
sentence.Network_cn: 聆听着唱片里鲁比·默里演唱《丹尼男孩》的时候，他们泪眼模糊。

sentence.Network_en: Whenever I see this picture I get all misty - eyed, I can hardly speak!
sentence.Network_cn: 每当我看到这幅照片时,眼睛就会湿润, 我几乎都说不出话来.

sentence.Network_en: Never misty - eyed , he keeps finding the right anecdote to support his view of American exceptionalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从不伤感, 总能不断挖掘出恰当的奇闻轶事来支持他关于美国异常理论的观点.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 动感... ... 1. too sth. for my blood 对我来说太...了 2. misty-eyed 热泪盈眶的 3. sharp shoot sb. 挑剔某人，用语言攻击某人.

list.abs: cause i was so misty eyed我是如此的原因薄雾眼睛

entry.tran: （尤指因为回忆起过去而开心或感伤得）泪眼蒙眬的
entry.def: If you say that something makes you misty-eyed, you mean that it makes you feel so happy or sentimental, especially about the past, that you feel as if you are going to cry.

example.ex: They got misty-eyed listening to records of Ruby Murray singing 'Danny Boy'.
example.tran: 聆听着唱片里鲁比·默里演唱《丹尼男孩》的时候，他们泪眼模糊。

means.word_mean: 1. having eyes blurred as with tears;

auth_sentence.content: The tax collector was steely eyed, and uncompromising.
auth_sentence.res_content: The tax collector was steely eyed, and uncompromising.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The tax collector was steely eyed, and uncompromising.

auth_sentence.content: A misty moonlight furred the grass, like rime.
auth_sentence.res_content: A misty moonlight furred the grass, like rime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A misty moonlight furred the grass, like rime.

auth_sentence.content: Takeshi Takahashi is hollow-eyed and looks and sounds exhausted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Takeshi Takahashi is hollow-eyed and looks and sounds exhausted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Takeshi Takahashi is hollow-eyed and looks and sounds exhausted.
